animeTitle: Kigyou Senshi Yamazaki: Long Distance Call
animeDescription: A 42-year-old salaryman is made to serve his company beyond the grave when his brain is installed in a super-powered android body in order to carry out corporate espionage.  (Source: Anime Encyclopedia)
